mapper.insert: insert into buy (buy_id, id, rent_id, option_name, color, buy_date, counseling_date, name, address, tel, month, buy_situation) values (#{buy_id}, #{id}, #{rent_id}, #{option_name}, #{color}, now(), #{counseling_date}, #{name}, #{address}, #{tel}, #{month}, #{buy_situation})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BUY WHERE ID = #{id} AND MONTH = 0
SELECT * FROM BUY WHERE ID = #{id} AND MONTH != 0

select count(*) from buy where
id like '%${buySearch}%' or name like '%${buySearch}%' or tel like '%${buySearch}%'
id name tel like '%${buySearch}%'

select gender, truncate(date_format(now(),'%Y')-substring(date_of_birth,1,4),0) as date_of_birth, count(if(gender = "남자", gender, null)) as man, count(if(gender = "여자", gender, null)) as women, sum(if(date_format(now(),'%Y')-substring(date_of_birth,1,4) between 20 and 29 , 1, 0)) as twenties, sum(if(date_format(now(),'%Y')-substring(date_of_birth,1,4) between 30 and 39 , 1, 0)) as thirties, sum(if(date_format(now(),'%Y')-substring(date_of_birth,1,4) between 40 and 49 , 1, 0)) as forties, sum(if(date_format(now(),'%Y')-substring(date_of_birth,1,4) between 50 and 59 , 1, 0)) as fifteen, sum(if(date_format(now(),'%Y')-substring(date_of_birth,1,4) between 60 and 69 , 1, 0)) as sixties from member where id = #{id}

select ifnull(b.rank,0) from (SELECT a.rent_id, count(a.rent_id) count, @rownum := @rownum+1 AS rank
FROM (SELECT rent_id, count(rent_id) count FROM buy group by rent_id order by count desc) as a,
(SELECT @rownum :=0) AS R group by rent_id order by rank) b
where rent_id = #{rent_id};

select ifnull(b.rank,0) from (SELECT a.rent_id, count(a.rent_id) count, @rownum := @rownum+1 AS rank
FROM
(SELECT q.rent_id, e.car_kind, count(q.rent_id) count FROM buy q, rent w, car e where q.rent_id = w.rent_id and w.car_id = e.car_id and car_kind = #{car_kind} group by q.rent_id order by count desc) as a,
(SELECT @rownum :=0) AS R group by rent_id order by rank) b
where rent_id = #{rent_id};
